text: Yaad karo, jab Moosa ne apni qaum ke liye pani ki dua ki to humne kaha ke falaan chattan par apna asa maaro chunanchey ussey barah (twelve) chashmey (springs) phoot nikle aur har qabiley ne jaan liya ke kaunsi jagah uske pani lene ki hai. Us waqt yeh hidayat kardi gayi thi ke Allah ka diya hua rizq khao, pio aur zameen mein fasaad na phaylate phiro
